NOTICE_DATA.ORIGINAL_CPV: Works for complete or part construction and civil engineering work
Engineering design services for the construction of civil engineering works

CODIF_DATA.AA_AUTHORITY_TYPE: Ministry or any other national or federal authority
CODIF_DATA.RP_REGULATION: European Investment Bank, European Investment Fund, European Bank for Reconstruction and Development
CODIF_DATA.HEADING: BI303

ML_TI_DOC.TI_TEXT: ЕИБ - Набавяне на консултантски услуги за основен дизайн, подробен дизайн, управление на проекта, надзор на строителните дейности и валидиране на помещение с контролирана атмосфера за изграждането на сградата на институт BioSense в Нови Сад, Сърбия

EIB - Zajištění poradenských služeb pro hlavní návrh, podrobný návrh, řízení projektu, dohled nad stavebními pracemi a schválení čistých prostor za účelem výstavby budovy institutu BioSense ve městě Novi Sad, Srbsko

EIB - Indkøb af rådgivningstjenester i forbindelse med den overordnede projektering, den detaljerede projektering, projektledelsen, overvågningen af bygge- og anlægsarbejder og renrumsvalidering til opførelsen af BioSense Institute-bygningen i Novi Sad, Serbien

EIB - Beschaffung von Beratungsleistungen bezüglich Hauptplanung, Detailplanung, Projektmanagement, Bauüberwachung und Reinraumvalidierung für den Bau des Gebäudes des BioSense Institute in Novi Sad, Serbien

ΕΤΕπ - Παροχή συμβουλευτικών υπηρεσιών για τη βασική και τη λεπτομερή μελέτη, τη διαχείριση έργου, την επίβλεψη των έργων πολιτικού μηχανικού και την επικύρωση των καθαρών χώρων (clean rooms), στο πλαίσιο της κατασκευής του κτιρίου του Ινστιτούτου BioSense στο Νόβι Σαντ, Σερβία

EIB - Procurement of consultancy services for the main design, detailed design, project management, supervision of civil works and clean room validation for the construction of the BioSense Institute Building in Novi Sad, Serbia

BEI - Contratación de servicios de consultoría para el diseño principal, el diseño detallado, la gestión de proyecto, la supervisión de las obras de ingeniería civil y la validación de las salas blancas para la construcción del edificio del instituto BioSense en Novi Sad, en Serbia

EIP - Serbias Novi Sadis BioSense’i instituudi hoone ehitamise põhiplaneeringu, detailplaneeringu, projektijuhtimise, tsiviilehitustööde järelevalve ning puhta keskkonna kinnitamise nõustamisteenuste hankimine

EIP - Konsultointipalvelujen hankinta perus- ja detaljisuunnittelua, projektinhallintaa, rakennustöiden valvontaa ja puhdastilan hyväksyntää varten BioSense-instituutin rakennuksen rakentamiseksi Novi Sadiin Serbiaan

BEI - Marché de services de conseil pour la conception principale, la conception détaillée, la gestion de projet, la supervision des travaux de génie civil et la validation des salles blanches dans le cadre de la construction du bâtiment de l’institut BioSense à Novi Sad, en Serbie

BEI - Procurement of consultancy services for the main design, detailed design, project management, supervision of civil works and clean room validation for the construction of the BioSense Institute Building in Novi Sad, Serbia

EIB - Nabava usluga savjetovanja za glavni nacrt, detaljni nacrt, upravljanje projektom, nadzor građevinskih radova i validaciju sterilne prostorije za izgradnju zgrade Instituta BioSense u Novom Sadu u Srbiji

EBB - Tanácsadási szolgáltatások beszerzése a BioSense Intézet újvidéki épületének építéséhez kapcsolódó fő tervezéshez, részletes tervezéshez, projektirányításhoz, építési munkák felügyeletéhez és tisztaszoba jóváhagyásához Szerbiában

BEI - Acquisto di servizi di consulenza per i principali elementi progettuali, il progetto esecutivo, la gestione del progetto, la supervisione dei lavori di genio civile e la validazione delle camere bianche nell’ambito della costruzione dell’istituto BioSense a Novi Sad, in Serbia

EIB - Konsultavimo paslaugų, susijusių su BioSense instituto pastato statybos Novi Sade, Serbijoje, pagrindiniu projektu, detaliuoju projektu, projekto valdymu, civilinės inžinerijos darbų priežiūra ir švariosios patalpos patvirtinimu, pirkimas

EIB - Konsultāciju pakalpojumu iepirkums saistībā ar galveno projektu, skiču projektu, projekta vadību, civilceltniecības darbu uzraudzību un tīras telpas apstiprināšanu BioSense institūta ēkas celtniecības vajadzībām Novi Sadā, Serbijā

BEI - Servizzi ta’ ksib u konsulenza għad-disinn prinċipali, id-disinn iddettaljat, l-immaniġġjar talproġett, is-sorveljanza tax-xogħlijiet ċivili u l-validazzjoni tal- kamra b’ambjent ikkontrollat għall-kostruzzjoni tal-Binja għall-BioSense Institute f’Novi Sad, is-Serbja

EIB - Aankoop van adviesdiensten inzake het hoofdontwerp, gedetaileerd ontwerp, projectbeheer, toezicht op civieltechnische werkzaamheden en de validatie van de cleanroom voor de bouw van het gebouw van het instituut BioSense in Novi Sad, Serbia

EBI - Świadczenie usług doradztwa w zakresie głównego projektu, projektu szczegółowego, zarządzania realizacją projektu, nadzoru nad robotami inżynieryjnymi oraz walidacji pomieszczenia czystego w ramach budowy budynku Instytutu BioSense w Nowym Sadzie w Serbii

BEI - Aquisição de serviços de consultoria para a conceção principal, conceção detalhada, gestão de projeto, supervisão de serviços de construção civil e validação de sala limpa para a construção do Edifício do Instituto BioSense em Novi Sad, na Sérvia

BEI - Achiziționare de servicii de consultanță pentru proiectul principal, proiectul detaliat, gestionarea proiectului, supravegherea lucrărilor de construcții civile și validarea camerei cu atmosferă controlată pentru construirea clădirii Institutului BioSense în Novi Sad, Serbia

EIB - Obstarávanie konzultačných služieb pre hlavný návrh, podrobný návrh, riadenie projektu, dohľad nad stavebnými prácami a schválenie čistej miestnosti na výstavbu budovy inštitútu BioSense v meste Novi Sad, Srbsko
EIB - Naročilo svetovalnih storitev za glavni načrt, podrobni načrt, vodenje projekta, nadzor gradbenih del in odobritev čiste sobe za gradnjo stavbe Inštituta BioSense v Novem Sadu, Srbija

EIB - Anskaffning av konsulttjänster för huvudsaklig projektering, detaljprojektering, projektförvaltning, övervakning av anläggningsarbeten och validering av renrum för anläggningen av BioSense-institutets byggnad i Novi Sad, Serbien

TI_DOC.P: EIB - Procurement of consultancy services for the main design, detailed design, project management, supervision of civil works and clean room validation for the construction of the BioSense Institute Building in Novi Sad, Serbia (RS-Belgrade)

CONTENTS.P: On the basis of the clause 3.7.14 of the Guide to procurement by the European Investment Bank and in accordance with the Law on the Ratification of the Financial Contract (Research and Development in the Public Sector) signed between the Republic of Serbia and the European Investment Bank FI N. 25.497 (RS) ("Official Gazette of the Republic of Serbia", no 5/10), the Conclusions of the Government of the Republic of Serbia No: 05 48-5555/2016 dated 13.6.2016 and No: 05 48-1/2017 dated 4.1.2017 and the legislature of the Republic of Serbia.
Publication reference:
Procurement notice: 2017/S 183-374139, Official Journal of the European Union date 9.23.2017
Borrower: The Government of the Republic of Serbia, Public Investment Management Office, Ministry of Education, Science and Technological Development as the Project Promoter
Name of the Project: Public Sector Research and Development. Sub-project: Creation of Centers of Excellence in priority research fields

Reference of the Bank’s financing: Public procurement is financed with a loan from the Financial Contract (Research and Development in the Public Sector) signed between the Republic of Serbia and the European Investment Bank FI N. 25.497 (RS) ("Official Gazette of the Republic of Serbia", no 5/10) as well as with the Contract on financing and management the Project of construction of the BioSense Institute Building in Novi Sad and procurement of the scientific and research equipment, phase 2, Project ”Antares” dated 29.6.2017 between the Republic of Serbia, Ministry of Education, Science and Technological Development, Public Investment Management Office and the BioSense Institute in Novi Sad.

Subject of the procurement: Public procurement of Consulting Services Main Design, Detailed Design, Project Management, Supervision of Civil Works and Clean Room Validation for Construction of BioSense Institute Building in Novi Sad, Serbia,
(Procurement No. IOP/10-2017/RD)
The total estimated value of the procurement is: 500 000,00 EUR excluding VAT.

Type of procedure: Open international public procurement procedure. A public invitation for bids was published in the Official Journal of the European Union on 23.9.2017, on the Purchaser’s website and Public Procurement Web portal of the Public procurement Office.
Number of tenders received:
Purchaser’s number of the contract and the value of the contract:
Purchaser’s number of the contract: 404-02-37/2017-01
Value of the contract: 384 000,00 EUR exclusive of local indirect taxes.
Name, adress and nationality of successful tenderer, and date of the contract award:
Date of contract award: 4.11.2018
Successful tenderer: Društvo sa ograničenom odgovornošću za konsalting, inženjering i zastupanje „Eurocons Group“, Vršac, Sterijina 19, 26300 Vršac, Republic of Serbia
Registration number: 08797773
Duration of contract: Unless terminated earlier pursuant to Clause GCC 19 hereof, this contract shall expire at the end of 48 months after the Effective Date as specified in the SCC.
Date of dispatch of this notice: 19.4.2018
